_comments.general: Configuration file for gobuster automation script
_comments.wordlist: Path to the wordlist file to use for scanning
_comments.mode: Scan mode - either 'dir' for directory scans or 'dns' for DNS enumeration
_comments.threads: Number of concurrent threads for scanning
_comments.status_code_show: HTTP status codes to display in results
_comments.status_code_avoid: HTTP status codes to hide from results
_comments.extensions: File extensions to scan for or path to file containing extensions
_comments.cname: Whether to include CNAME records in DNS mode (true/false)
_comments.exclude_length: Response lengths to exclude from results
